verses.verse: הַ֥לְלוּ <S%H1984><s%> Hal-lu Praise יָ֨הּ׀ <S%H3050><s%> yah ye the LORD אוֹדֶ֣ה <S%H3034><s%> o-Deh I will praise יְ֭הוָה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh the LORD בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> be-chol all לֵבָ֑ב <S%H3824><s%> le-Vav; with [my] whole heart בְּס֖וֹד <S%H5475><s%> be-Sod in the assembly יְשָׁרִ֣ים <S%H3477><s%> ye-sha-Rim of the upright וְעֵדָֽה׃ <S%H5712><s%> ve-'e-Dah. and [in] the congregation

גְּ֭דֹלִים <S%H1419><s%> Ge-do-lim [are] great מַעֲשֵׂ֣י <S%H4639><s%> ma-'a-Sei The works יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh; of the LORD דְּ֝רוּשִׁ֗ים <S%H1875><s%> de-ru-Shim, sought out לְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> le-chol all חֶפְצֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H2656><s%> chef-tzei-Hem. of all them that have pleasure

הוֹד־ <S%H1935><s%> hod- [is] honourable וְהָדָ֥ר <S%H1926><s%> ve-ha-Dar and glorious פָּֽעֳל֑וֹ <S%H6467><s%> po-'o-Lo; His work וְ֝צִדְקָת֗וֹ <S%H6666><s%> ve-tzid-ka-To, and his righteousness עֹמֶ֥דֶת <S%H5975><s%> 'o-Me-det endureth לָעַֽד׃ <S%H5703><s%> la-'Ad. for ever

זֵ֣כֶר <S%H2143><s%> Ze-cher to be remembered עָ֭שָׂה <S%H6213><s%> 'A-sah He hath made לְנִפְלְאֹתָ֑יו <S%H6381><s%> le-nif-le-'o-Tav; his wonderful works חַנּ֖וּן <S%H2587><s%> chan-Nun [is] gracious וְרַח֣וּם <S%H7349><s%> ve-ra-Chum and full of compassion יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh. the LORD

טֶ֭רֶף <S%H2964><s%> Te-ref meat נָתַ֣ן <S%H5414><s%> na-Tan He hath given לִֽירֵאָ֑יו <S%H3373><s%> li-re-'Av; unto them that fear יִזְכֹּ֖ר <S%H2142><s%> yiz-Kor be mindful לְעוֹלָ֣ם <S%H5769><s%> le-'o-Lam him he will ever בְּרִיתֽוֹ׃ <S%H1285><s%> be-ri-To. of his covenant

כֹּ֣חַ <S%H3581><s%> Ko-ach the power מַ֭עֲשָׂיו <S%H4639><s%> Ma-'a-sav of his works הִגִּ֣יד <S%H5046><s%> hig-Gid He hath shewed לְעַמּ֑וֹ <S%H5971><s%> le-'am-Mo; his people לָתֵ֥ת <S%H5414><s%> la-Tet that he may give לָ֝הֶ֗ם la-Hem, נַחֲלַ֥ת <S%H5159><s%> na-cha-Lat them the heritage גּוֹיִֽם׃ <S%H1471><s%> go-Yim. of the heathen

מַעֲשֵׂ֣י <S%H4639><s%> ma-'a-Sei The works יָ֭דָיו <S%H3027><s%> Ya-dav of his hands אֱמֶ֣ת <S%H571><s%> 'e-Met [are] verity וּמִשְׁפָּ֑ט <S%H4941><s%> u-mish-Pat; and judgment נֶ֝אֱמָנִ֗ים <S%H539><s%> ne-'e-ma-Nim, [are] sure כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- All פִּקּוּדָֽיו׃ <S%H6490><s%> pik-ku-Dav. all his commandments

סְמוּכִ֣ים <S%H5564><s%> se-mu-Chim They stand fast לָעַ֣ד <S%H5703><s%> la-'Ad for ever לְעוֹלָ֑ם <S%H5769><s%> le-'o-Lam; and ever עֲ֝שׂוּיִ֗ם <S%H6213><s%> 'a-su-Yim, [and are] done בֶּאֱמֶ֥ת <S%H571><s%> be-'e-Met in truth וְיָשָֽׁר׃ <S%H3477><s%> ve-ya-Shar. and uprightness

פְּד֤וּת׀ <S%H6304><s%> pe-Dut redemption שָׁ֘לַ֤ח <S%H7971><s%> sha-Lach He sent לְעַמּ֗וֹ <S%H5971><s%> le-'am-Mo, unto his people צִוָּֽה־ <S%H6680><s%> tziv-vah- he hath commanded לְעוֹלָ֥ם <S%H5769><s%> le-'o-Lam for ever בְּרִית֑וֹ <S%H1285><s%> be-ri-To; his covenant קָד֖וֹשׁ <S%H6918><s%> ka-Doosh holy וְנוֹרָ֣א <S%H3372><s%> ve-no-Ra and reverend שְׁמֽוֹ׃ <S%H8034><s%> she-Mo. [is] his name

רֵ֘אשִׁ֤ית <S%H7225><s%> re-Shit [is] the beginning חָכְמָ֨ה׀ <S%H2451><s%> choch-mah of wisdom יִרְאַ֬ת <S%H3374><s%> yir-'At The fear יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh of the LORD שֵׂ֣כֶל <S%H7922><s%> Se-chel understanding ט֭וֹב <S%H2896><s%> Tov a good לְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> le-chol have all עֹשֵׂיהֶ֑ם <S%H6213><s%> 'o-sei-Hem; have all they that do תְּ֝הִלָּת֗וֹ <S%H8416><s%> te-hil-la-To, [his commandments] his praise עֹמֶ֥דֶת <S%H5975><s%> 'o-Me-det endureth לָעַֽד׃ <S%H5703><s%> la-'Ad. for ever
